koriyawa, uthuru koriyawa saha dakunu koriyawa lesa wenwana lakunu pala karannata patan gaththe owunowun athara wu bedimak nisama nowana bawa loka ithihasaya kiyayi. 1910 di japanaya koriyawa thaman wethata aa`da ganima koriyawa dekada wime pasubima sakasuyeya. 1919 kalaya wana wita koriyanu nidahas satane purogamin amerikanu mathawadayan desata adennata patan gena atha.

i.wadasatahana awasanaye di, stikar mradranaya kirimata waya wu mudala departhamenthuwa wetha piyawimata katayuthu kala yuthu ya. ee. awasan warthawa- 2018.02.15 dinata pera disthrik sanskruthika niladhari wetha labimata salaswiya yuthuya “ sarwa aagamika wadasatahana" loka wasi siyalu janathawa janawari palamu wanida subha dinayak lesa salakanu labayi.
ee anuwa, labana okthobar wana wita lankawe palath 9 n hayaka (6) mahajana niyojithayin nomathi palanayak bihiweyi.
namuth pakshawalin “path karana” kenata thora ganna niyojithaya tharam nithyanukulabhawayak nomatha.
polonnaruwa disthrik lekamwaraya lesa methek katayuthu kala jyeshta paripalana niladhariyaku wana ranjith aariyarathna mahatha nawa thapalpathiwaraya lesa ikuth 15 weni dina wada bara gaththeya.

anushasaka mirisse dhammika na himi, 5.00 – 6.00 dhammapadaya shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 6.00 – 6.30 bodhipujawa shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri himi.kuppiyawaththe shri rajawaththe wappahimi 7.00 – 7.30ta sambuddha pujawa thalalle sirimahinda nahimi, 8.00 –9.00 bhawanawa rajawaththe wappa himi, 9.15 – 10.15 dharmadeshanaya rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi mulane gunananda himi, 10.30 – 11.00 sambuddha pujawa thalalle sirimahinda nahimi, 12. 15 – 12. 30ta buddhanussathi bhawanawa, wiharastha upasaka upasika samithiya, 2.15 – 3.15ta dharma deshanaya mapawwe
